details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم لا تؤاخذني بما يقولون، واغفر لي ما لا يعلمون، (واجعلني خيرا مما يظنون)
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ لَا تُؤَاخِذْنِيْ بِمَا يَقُوْلُوْنَ، وَاغْفِرْ لِيْ مَا لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ، (وَاجْعَلْنِيْ خَيْرًا مِّمَّا يَظُنُّوْنَ)
details.transliteration: Allaahumma laa tu'aakhithnee bimaa yaqooloona, waghfir lee maa laa ya'lamoona [waj'alnee khayram-mimmaa yadhunnoon.]
details.translations: Oh Allah, do not call me to account for what they say and forgive me for what they have no knowledge of [and make me better than they imagine]
details.reference: Al-Bukhari, Al Adab Al Mufrad No. 761. Al-Albani graded it sahih in Sahih Adabil Mufrad. Words between the brackets are from Baihaqi, 4/228

pageTitle: For the one that have been praised
